title: Bias Analysis of University Course Satisfaction Surveys: A Learning Design Element-Centered Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental statistical analysis and understanding of curriculum management
context.additional_context: Need to strengthen competencies in designing and evaluating customized curricula for adult learners.

learning_goals: Analyze the correlation between learning design elements (content, methodology, workload) and academic performance
Apply methodologies to identify potential biases in satisfaction survey results
Design data-driven decision-making processes utilizing the concept of generative uncertainty
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
